Package team21.pylonconstructor

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildConfig  
    DataTest
    Note: This class only tests data and data storage.
    ElasticSearch
    This class performs all the Elastic Search operations by making use of the ElasticSearchController class.
    ElasticSearchController
    This class was obtained from LonelyTwitter - lab5 repo on 8th March, 2017 and was initially written during the lab session.
    ElasticSearchController.AddMoodsTask
    A function which adds moods to elastic search
    ElasticSearchController.AddProfileTask
    A function which adds profiles to elastic search
    ElasticSearchController.DeleteMoodTask
    Removes a mood from the DB
    ElasticSearchController.DeleteProfileTask
    Removes a Profile from the DB
    ElasticSearchController.EditMoodsTask
    A function which edits moods stored on elastic search
    ElasticSearchController.FilterEmotionalState
    A function which filters moods from elastic search based on given emotional state
    ElasticSearchController.FilterTrigger
    A function which filters moods from elastic search based on given trigger
    ElasticSearchController.GetMoodsTask
    A function which gets moods from elastic search
    ElasticSearchController.GetProfileTask
    A function which gets a profile from elastic search
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumentation test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FilterActivity
    This class is an activity that allows the user to filter moods in their feed by certain parameters.
    LoginActivity
    The class is an activity that allows the user to login to their account.
    MainActivity
    This class is the default main activity.
    MoodAdapter
    This class extracts the data from the mood objects and passes it to activities to be displayed on screen.
    MoodFactory
    This class creates mood objects for testing.
    MoodFeedActivity
    This class is the main view of the app.

    SychronizerTest
    Created by jeffreyroutledge on 2017-02-26.
    UpdateMoodActivity
    This class is the activity for updating and creating moods.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ReasonTooLongException
    Will throw exception if mood reason exceeds maximum length.
